name: I'm no Demon
description:
I'm no demon is a multiplayer murder mystery type of game for up to 12 players set in a dungeon. Players are secretly assigned to one of two teams: explorers and traitors.

  • Explorer: explore the dungeon and must either collect gold or find and eliminate all traitors to win.
  • Traitors: try to kill all explorers. Traitors can only kill other players when transforming into a demon. To transform into a demon a traitor must collect skulls hidden in the dungeon.

To win as a traitor you will need to be stealthy and not let other players know your role. If confronted by others you will need to argue your way out of tricky situations!

Controls:

  • WASD: moving
  • SPACE: enter / exit barrels
  • More to come soon!

This is still an early release of InD. If you have questions or feedback, please submit it via our Discord server at https://discord.gg/KFaKsp5

Game not loading? Please try to use Google Chrome to play. If this is not working, please let us know!

Happy hunting! 😈
